nRowsRead = 1000 # specify 'None' if want to read whole file
# Regularities_by_liaisons_Trains_France.csv may have more rows in reality, but we are only loading/previewing the first 1000 rows
df1 = pd.read_csv('/kaggle/input/Regularities_by_liaisons_Trains_France.csv', delimiter=',', nrows = nRowsRead)
df1.dataframeName = 'Regularities_by_liaisons_Trains_France.csv'
nRow, nCol = df1.shape
print(f'There are {nRow} rows and {nCol} columns')
